FORM 6-K                   
                                              
      SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION      
                                              
            Washington, D.C. 20549            
                                              
      Report of a Foreign Private Issuer      
                                              
      Pursuant to Rule 13a-16 or 15d-16       
    of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934    
                                     
  For the month of March 2024        
  Commission File Number: 001-13928  
                                     
             Royal Bank of Canada             
                                              
             (Name of registrant)             
                                              
  200 Bay Street                              
  Royal Bank Plaza      1 Place Ville Marie   
  Toronto, Ontario      Montreal, Quebec      
  Canada M5J 2J5        Canada H3B 3A9        
  Attention: Senior     Attention: Senior     
  Vice-President,       Vice-President,       
  Associate General     Associate General     
  Counsel &             Counsel & Secretary   
  Secretary                                   
                                              
   (Address of principal executive offices)   
                                              
  Indicate by check mark whether the          
  registrant files or will file annual        
  reports under cover of                      
  Form 20-F or Form 40-F.                     
                                              
                              
  Form 20-F o    Form 40-F x  
                              
                                              
  Indicate by check mark if the registrant    
  is submitting the Form 6-K in paper as      
  permitted by Regulation S-T                 
  Rule 101(b)(1): o                           
                                              
                                              
  Indicate by check mark if the registrant    
  is submitting the Form 6-K in paper as      
  permitted by Regulation S-T                 
  Rule 101(b)(7): o                           
                                              
                                              
  EXCEPT FOR EXHIBIT                          
  99.1, WHICH IS ONLY FURNISHED AND NOT       
  INCORPORATED BY REFERENCE INTO ANY          
  REGISTRATION STATEMENT, THIS REPORT ON      
  FORM 6-K SHALL BE DEEMED                    
  TO BE INCORPORATED BY REFERENCE INTO ROYAL  
  BANK OF CANADA’S REGISTRATION STATEMENT ON  
  FORM F-3 (FILE NO. 333-275898) AND THE      
  REGISTRATION                                
  STATEMENTS ON FORM S-8 (FILE NOS.           
  333-12036, 333-12050, 333-13052,            
  333-13112, 333-117922, 333-207754,          
  333-207750, 333-207748, 333-252536          
  AND 333-268715) TO BE A PART THEREOF FROM   
  THE DATE ON WHICH THIS REPORT IS            
  FURNISHED, TO THE EXTENT NOT SUPERSEDED BY  
  DOCUMENTS OR REPORTS                        
  SUBSEQUENTLY FILED OR FURNISHED.            
                                              
On March 28, 2024, Royal Bank of Canada
announced
the completion of its previously announced
acquisition of HSBC Bank Canada.
                  Signatures                  
Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934,
the registrant has duly caused this report to
be signed on its behalf by the undersigned,
thereunto duly authorized.
                                              
          ROYAL BANK OF                       
          CANADA                              
  By:                       /s/ Nadine Ahn    
                            Nadine            
  Name:                     Ahn               
  Title:                    Chief Financial   
                            Officer           
                            Date: March 29,   
                            2024              
                                              
                EXHIBIT INDEX                 
                                              
  Exhibit    Description of Exhibit           
  99.1       Press Release – RBC completes    
             acquisition of HSBC Bank Canada
